instructions: Image titled Find Who Liked or Retweeted Your Tweet Step 1 1 Open the Twitter app on your phone or tablet. It's the blue bird icon typically found on the home screen (iPhone/Android) or in the app drawer (Android). If you're not already signed in, follow the on-screen instructions to sign in now. If you don't already have the app, you can download it for free from the App Store or Play Store . Image titled Find Who Liked or Retweeted Your Tweet Step 2 2 Tap your profile photo. It's at the top-left corner of the app. A menu will expand. Image titled Find Who Liked or Retweeted Your Tweet Step 3 3 Tap . It's near the top of the menu. Image titled Find Who Liked or Retweeted Your Tweet Step 4 4 Tap the tweet you want to check. This opens the tweet on its own page. Image titled Find Who Liked or Retweeted Your Tweet Step 5 5 Tap or under the tweet. This displays the list of people who've retweeted or liked your tweet. Advertisement
